children.text: spoken word series event held at Building Danse (55 Avenue des Pins East, 2nd floor, Montreal, QC, H2W 1N6) hosted by Fortner Anderson and Ian Ferrier. Performances by Hieronymus Borscht Nonet (Sam Shalabi and Unknown_Musician1), Fortner Anderson, Ian Ferrier, Endre Farkas, Swifty Lazar (Todd Swift and Tom Walsh), ga press (Colin Christie and Corey Frost), Groupe de Poesie Moderne, Fluffy Pagan Echoes (Ran Elfassy, Victoria Stanton, Scott Duncan, Vince Tinguely, and Justin McGrail), Dee Smith, Norman Nawrocki, Ian Stephens, and more.
